auth.login-subtitle: Welcome back! Please enter your login details.
auth.signup-subtitle: Create a new account by entering the required information.
auth.name: Full Name

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email and you will soon receive instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.success: Password reset link has been sent to your email.

landing.headline: Turn your voice into professional reports quickly and easily.
landing.info: Docora helps you create professional and detailed reports using only your voice. Fast, simple, and without typing. Create a PDF report in a few clicks and send it anywhere — directly from the app. You speak – Docora records, formats, and sends.
landing.info-p: Save time, improve efficiency, and stay ahead of the competition.

about.headline: is an innovative tool that lets you quickly and efficiently create professional PDF reports and notes using only voice commands.
about.description: With minimal effort, you save valuable time and simplify your daily tasks. Automate your documentation and speed up processes — stay one step ahead of the competition and focus on what truly matters: your customers and your business.
about.ideal-for: Ideal for anyone who wants to modernize their workflow, eliminate unnecessary paperwork, and raise the quality of their business to a higher level.

features.send-report: Sends reports wherever you want (Gmail, Viber)

pricing.title: Docora is here for you. Choose a plan.

footer.description: Docora is a platform that makes creating reports and notes easier by using voice. Whether you're a professional, entrepreneur, or a team member taking notes, Docora saves you time and eliminates the need for manual typing.

contactForm.title: Contact Us
contactForm.description: Have questions, suggestions, or want a custom offer tailored to your needs? Write us using the form below – we’re here to help you as quickly as possible.

report.headline: Create a detailed report or note
report.name: Full name

report-display.headline: Generated report
report-display.success: The report has been successfully sent to the email!
report-display.error: An error occurred while sending the email.
